gen_setup: name of the generation to use. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'vali'
gen_version: version of the generation to use. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: '1.1.0'

gen_id: Unique id of the generation. Replaces [key] with corrspnd str. Replaces * with a unique identifer. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: '[gen_setup]_*'
model_id: Id of the model of the ckpt used sampling. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
name_match_str: string to search for models when in pure sampling mode. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
time: Time of the generation. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
seed: Seed to use for sampling. New random seed if <0. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: -1
grid_filename: Place to save grid plot. Empty string saves in default save folder. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
light_stats_filename: Place to save light stats. Empty string saves in default save folder. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
inter_folder: Place to save intermediate plot. Empty string saves in default save folder. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
raw_samples_folder: Place to save raw samples. Empty string saves in default save folder. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
concat_inter_filename: Place to save concatenated intermediate plot. Empty string saves in default save folder. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
origin: Variable for storing arguments which differed wrt. defaults and their tier/values. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''.
default_save_folder: Default folder to save samples in, empty string defaults to [model_folder]/samples/. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
datasets: Datasets to use for sampling. Only available in gen mode. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''

clip_denoised: Whether to clip denoised samples to [0,1] range. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true
num_timesteps: Number of timesteps to use for sampling. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 100
guidance_weight: Weight of classifier free diffusion guidance, 0.0 for No guidance. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.0
guidance_kwargs: Keyword arguments which are passed to the guidance forward pass, empty for none. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''
eval_batch_size: Batch size for evaluation. 0 for same as train. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 0
sampler_type: Type of sampler to use. One of ['ddpm','ddim']. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'ddpm'
self_cond: Whether to use self conditioning. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
ema_idx: EMA model idx to use for sampling. negative for no EMA (normal model). TYPE: float. DEFAULT: -1
split: Dataset split to use for sampling. One of ['train','vali','test']. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'vali'
kwargs_mode: How to get kwargs for the model forward passes. One of ['train', 'only_image', 'all']. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'train'
postprocess: Which postprocessing to use. One of ['none','area0.005']. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'none'
pure_testing: Whether to use pure testing mode. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true
semantic_prob: Probability of sampling semantic labels (instead of instance). -1.0 for training inheriting from training. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: -1.0

do_agg: Whether to use matplotlib 'agg' as backend for plotting (to avoid memory leak). TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true
progress_bar: Whether to show a progress bar for batches. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true
progress_bar_timestep: Whether to show a second progress bar running over timesteps during sampling. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
save_light_stats: Whether to save stats in the default_save_folder. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
save_raw_inter: Whether to save raw intermediate samples. Needs save_raw_samples==true to have an effect. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
save_raw_samples: Whether to save raw samples. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
save_sample_opts: Whether to save the sample options in the default_save_folder. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true
return_samples: Whether to return samples. TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: false
remove_old: Should old plots matching the format and in the same folder of newly produced ones be removed? TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true
plotting_functions: Which plotting functions to use. Comma seperated string of zero or more of ['grid','inter','concat']. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 'grid,concat'
pure_eval_mode: Whether to use pure evaluation mode (comparing with unprocessed gt). TYPE: bool. DEFAULT: true

num_votes: Number of votes (segmentation masks) to use per image when sampling. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 5
num_samples: Number of samples (unique images) to produce votes for. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 8
num_inter_steps: Number of unique intermediate steps to save for saving/plotting (limited by num_timesteps also). TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 10
num_inter_samples: Number of intermediate samples to save for saving/plotting. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 8
num_grid_samples: Number of samples to use for a grid plot. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 8
num_save_raw_samples: Number of raw samples to save. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 8
inter_votes_per_sample: How many votes per image (e.g. 1=only first vote) should intermediate steps be saved for. TYPE: int. DEFAULT: 1
